meanings.definition: A larval salamander found in bodies of water.
meanings.sent1: The waterdog swam gracefully in the pond.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a waterdog in the stream while fishing.
meanings.sent3: The waterdog wore a tiny swimsuit to the pool party.
meanings.sent4: The waterdog transformed into a sleek swimmer under the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The curious waterdog explored every corner of the lake.

meanings.definition: A dog that enjoys being in or around water.
meanings.sent1: My waterdog loves splashing in the river.
meanings.sent2: The waterdog happily fetched the ball from the lake.
meanings.sent3: The waterdog's favorite game is water tag with the kids.
meanings.sent4: She was a true waterdog, always seeking the cool embrace of the waves.
meanings.sent5: The loyal waterdog never missed a chance to dive into the ocean.
